data.title: In Sri Lanka, China's Building Spree Is Raising Questions About Sovereignty
data.meta_description: A Chinese state-owned operator took control of a port on a 99-year lease after Sri Lanka defaulted on its loans. An adviser to Sri Lanka's president said the government wants China to "give it back."
